sual: What kind of work do I enjoy the most?
cavab: I enjoy doing financial and economic analysis, solving data-driven problems, and creating practical tools that simplify difficult topics.

sual: What services can I help you with?
cavab: I can provide support in the areas of financial analysis, budgeting, reporting, business planning, and banking consulting.

sual: Who do I usually collaborate with?
cavab: I usually work with startups, small and medium businesses, entrepreneurs, and individuals looking for clear direction and structured information in the field of finance.

sual: What kind of projects am I open to?
cavab: I am open to working on fintech ideas, data analysis projects, financial models, and I am also always ready to teach, give seminars, and share my knowledge.

sual: Why do people choose to work with me?
cavab: Because I have a practical approach, attention to detail, and the ability to translate complex financial topics into simple, understandable, and actionable results.
